content:
ScrollViewerAutomationPeer Class

In this Article

Exposes ScrollViewer types to UI Automation.

Syntax

Declaration

public class ScrollViewerAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider

Constructors summary

ScrollViewerAutomationPeer(ScrollViewer)

Initializes a new instance of the ScrollViewerAutomationPeer class.

Methods summary

GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

Gets the name of the ScrollViewer that is associated with this ScrollViewerAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.
GetClassNameCore()

Gets the name of the ScrollViewer that is associated with this ScrollViewerAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.
GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the ScrollViewer that is associated with this ScrollViewerAutomationPeer.
IsControlElementCore()

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the ScrollViewer that is associated with this ScrollViewerAutomationPeer is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the GUI. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*.

    Returns

    • String

      A string that contains "ScrollViewer".

  • GetPattern(PatternInterface)

    Gets the control pattern for the ScrollViewer that is associated with this ScrollViewerAutomationPeer.

    public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);

      PatternInterface

    Returns

      If patternInterface is PatternInterface, this method returns a this pointer; otherwise, this method returns null.

  • IsControlElementCore()

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the ScrollViewer that is associated with this ScrollViewerAutomationPeer is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the GUI. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*.

    protected override bool IsControlElementCore ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      If the stem.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent* is null, this method returns true; otherwise, false.
